app.name: TousAntiCovid
onboarding.welcomeController.title: Welcome
onboarding.welcomeController.mainMessage: Receive alerts and alert others about possible exposure to COVID-19

Use TousAntiCovid to help fight the pandemic by reducing the risk of transmission.


This application was created in collaboration with the Minist√®re des Solidarit√©s et de la Sant√© (French Ministry of Solidarity and Health) and Sant√© Publique France with regard to health and medical recommendations.
onboarding.explanationsController.title: It‚Äôs easy!
onboarding.explanationsController.stepFo: TousAntiCovid uses your phone‚Äôs Bluetooth connection to detect other users‚Äô phones that are close to yours.
onboarding.explanationsController.stepIn: You will be alerted if you have been in close contact with a user who has tested positive for COVID-19.
onboarding.explanationsController.stepBe: Protect your loved ones and everybody else

If you have tested positive for COVID-19, your positive test result will come with a code to be scanned or entered manually, or, alternatively, you will be given a code by whoever performed the test. You can use this code to send anonymous alerts to users who have been in contact with you.
onboarding.privacyController.title: Confidentiality
onboarding.proximityController.title: Detection
onboarding.proximityController.mainMessa:
TousAntiCovid needs to use your phone‚Äôs Bluetooth connection in order to work.
No location data will be shared or recorded.
onboarding.beAwareController.title: Notifications
onboarding.beAwareController.mainMessage: Receive a push notification if you have been exposed

You will be alerted if you have been in close contact with someone who has tested positive for COVID-19.

TousAntiCovid will then give you the recommendations from the Ministry of Social Affairs and Health.
onboarding.gesturesController.title: Don‚Äôt forget!
onboarding.gesturesController.mainMessag: Social distancing measures are vitally important
onboarding.gesturesController.gesture2: Cough or sneeze into your elbow or into a tissue
onboarding.gesturesController.gesture3: Use single-use tissues and throw them in the bin
onboarding.gesturesController.gesture4: Avoid shaking hands, hugs and kisses
onboarding.batteryController.title: Battery use
onboarding.batteryController.mainMessage: TousAntiCovid needs to run as a background app.
To enable TousAntiCovid to run as a background app, deactivate battery optimisation for TousAntiCovid only.
declareController.message.testedPositive: Have you tested positive for COVID-19 and do you want to identify yourself in the app?

You should be sent an email, text or letter containing a QR code sent by the SI-DEP platform (not from your laboratory), provided your contact details were correctly entered at the time of the test.
You can either access this QR code directly by clicking on the link or scanning it into the application, or you can access it manually by entering the 32-character code located below the QR code.
myHealthController.message.youHaveSympto:
Do you want to know what to do?
This questionnaire can guide you.
myHealthController.message.cured.title: If you are not ill
myHealthController.message.cured.subtitl: Your COVID-19 test is negative. Report this by tapping the button below:
myHealthController.state.nothing.title: You have not been exposed to any users who have tested positive for COVID-19
myHealthController.state.nothing.subtitl: Remember to follow social distancing measures and health guidelines
myHealthController.state.contact.title: In the last few days, you have been exposed to one or more users who have tested positive for COVID-19 and you are now a high-risk potential contact
myHealthController.state.contact.subtitl: Self-isolate, contact your doctor to inform them that you have been identified as an at-risk contact and get tested with priority access. Do not contact the French National Health Insurance - they will be in touch with you if the person who has tested positive knows you. To find out how long to self-isolate for, go to the app home page.
myHealthController.state.deleteNotificat: Are you sure you want to temporarily hide your status?
sharingController.title: Share
sharingController.mainMessage.title: The more of us who use TousAntiCovid, the better protected we will be
sharingController.mainMessage.subtitle: We need you. How effective this app is in combating COVID-19 depends on you! Please share it with your friends and family.
sharingController.appSharingMessage: I‚Äôm using TousAntiCovid to fight the pandemic: to send and receive alerts. You should install the app too: https://bonjour.tousanticovid.gouv.fr/
aboutController.title: About
aboutController.mainMessage.title: About TousAntiCovid
aboutController.mainMessage.subtitle:
This app was developed by the TousAntiCovid team under the supervision of the Ministry of Social Affairs and Health and the Secretary of State for Digital Affairs.
The TousAntiCovid team: Inria, the French National Cybersecurity Agency, Capgemini, Dassault Syst√®mes, Inserm, Lunabee Studio, the Ministry of Social Affairs and Health, Orange, Public Health France and Withings.

myHealthController.step.isolate.atRisk.s: Please limit the number of people you are in contact with. Make sure you strictly adhere to social distancing guidelines.
Please follow social distancing guidelines in order to help slow down the spread of the virus
myHealthController.step.beCareful.atRisk: Keep a close eye on the appearance of symptoms
If you are in any doubt, go to My Covid Advice and complete the guidance questionnaire, or contact your doctor.
myHealthController.step.appointment.titl: Call your doctor and get tested
myHealthController.step.appointment.subt: Call your doctor and get tested today with priority access. If you don't have a doctor, call the number below to find a doctor (free service, toll free call)
enterCodeController.title: Your code
enterCodeController.mainMessage.title: Please enter the code you were sent by the SI-DEP with the results of your test (below your QR code) or by the person who performed your test (6-character code valid for 1 hour).
enterCodeController.mainMessage.subtitle: These codes are randomly assigned and do not contain any personal information.
enterCodeController.noCodeEnteredAlert.m: You must enter the code before you can continue
scanCodeController.explanation: Hold your phone next to the QR code printed on your test results (this code is anonymous and does not contain any personal information)

common.needCameraAccessToScan: The app needs to access the camera in order to scan the QR Code. You can also read our privacy policy regarding this camera permission.
common.needLocalisationAccessToScan: The app needs access to your location in order to be able to scan neighbouring devices

common.error.server: A lot of you have joined TousAntiCovid. Thank you! We're doing everything we can to get back online very soon.

sendHistoryController.title: Send history
sendHistoryController.mainMessage.title: Save lives by joining the citizens‚Äô fight against COVID-19
sendHistoryController.mainMessage.subtit:
Anonymously sharing your "Bluetooth contacts" will help to break the chain of transmission and to save lives.

By sending this information, I authorise TousAntiCovid to store it on the server for 14 days.

myHealthController.sick.mainMessage.subt:
Here are the health recommendations.

Make sure you follow self-isolation guidelines in order to stop the spread of the virus.

Call your doctor if you have any doubts regarding the progress of the disease. If you don't have a doctor, call the number below to find a doctor (free service, toll free call).

 If you are having trouble breathing, call 15 immediately (or 114 for the hearing impaired).

But you can still help in the fight against COVID-19 by sharing this app. The more people use it, the more effective it will be.
Tell your friends and family!

myHealthController.covidAdvices.subtitle: Find personalised advice about prevention and care by going to the "My Covid Advice" website. "My Covid Advice" is a service provided by the Ministry of Social Affairs and Health.

myHealthController.notification.title: Risk alert
myHealthController.notification.subtitle:
You will be notified if you have been in close contact with a user who has tested positive for COVID-19 (exposure within one metre lasting 15 minutes or more). Your status will be checked every 24h.

TousAntiCovid will then give you the recommendations from the Ministry of Social Affairs and Health.

widget.noStatus.info: Your status will be displayed here (updated once a day)

info.notification.newsAvailable.body: TousAntiCovid provides news, facts and figures about COVID-19. Check it out now!
notification.channel.news.title: News
proximityController.error.batchLocalisat: With your smartphone and this version of Android, deactivating Android location data may disrupt the Bluetooth connection used by TousAntiCovid.
home.activationExplanation: Activating TousAntiCovid will keep you informed and inform others about the risk of infection, allowing you to play your part in the fight against COVID-19.
home.infoSection.title: News
home.declareSection.title: Report test result
home.declareSection.cellTitle: Have you tested positive for COVID-19?
home.sharingSection.title: Share test result
home.sharingSection.cellTitle: The more of us use it, the better protected we will all be
home.moreSection.title: More
home.healthSection.title: My health
home.healthSection.noContact.cellSubtitl: Tap here for advice, to find out where to get tested and more
keyfigure.registered.label: Net recordings
keyfigure.registered.description: The number of people who have downloaded and activated the app since 2nd June 2020.
keyfigure.notification.label: Notified by the application
keyfigure.notification.description: The number of people notified by the app following exposure to COVID-19 since 2nd June 2020.
keyfigure.qrcodes.label: Reported cases of COVID-19
keyfigure.qrcodes.description: The number of users to have been reported as having tested positive for COVID-19 in the app (since 2nd June 2020).
keyfigure.reffectif.label: R number
keyfigure.reffectif.description: The reproduction number for the virus is updated once a week: this is the average number of people that someone with the virus will infect. If the R number is above 1, the epidemic will spread; if it is below 1, the epidemic will stop spreading. This indicator, which is recorded on Tuesdays and updated on Thursdays, reflects the epidemiological situation roughly 7 days previously and should be interpreted in light of testing and the available data.
keyfigure.tauxincidence.label: Incidence rate
keyfigure.tauxincidence.description: The incidence rate is the number of people to have tested positive (RT-PCR and antigen tests) for the first time in more than 60 days out of the total population. It is given for 100,000 people and is used to make comparisons between different areas.
keyfigure.tauxpositivite.label: Positivity rate
keyfigure.tauxpositivite.description: The positivity rate is the number of people to have tested positive (RT-PCR and antigen tests) for the first time in more than 60 days out of the total number of people to have tested positive or negative over a given period; and who had not previously tested positive in the previous 60 days.
keyfigure.tauxoccupation.label: Intensive care occupancy
keyfigure.tauxoccupation.description: This indicator reflects the occupancy rates of hospital ICUs, and is expressed as the number of patients with COVID-19 who are currently in ICU out of the total number of ICU beds available prior to the crisis.
keyfigure.nombrecas.label: New cases
keyfigure.nombrecas.description: This indicator, which is only available at a national level, corresponds to the number of confirmed new cases (RT-PCR and antigen tests) over the last 24 hours. Figures reported at the start of the week will often be higher as a result of a drop in testing activity over the weekend.
keyfigure.nombrecasj3.label: Positive cases identified D-3
keyfigure.nombrecasj3.description: This indicator corresponds to the number of new cases (RT-PCR and antigen tests) of COVID-19, recorded by test date, and reflects the situation three days ago. This provides enough time to ensure that the data gives an accurate reflection of the epidemiological situation three days ago.
keyfigure.nouveauxpatientsrea.label: New patients in ICU
keyfigure.nouveauxpatientsrea.descriptio: This is the number of new patients with COVID-19 admitted to ICU over the past 24 hours.
keyfigure.patientsrea.label: Patients in ICU
keyfigure.patientsrea.description: This is the number of patients with COVID-19 currently in ICU.
keyFiguresController.title: Key figures
home.infoSection.newPostalCode.subtitle: You can access key data at a local level by entering your postcode.
home.infoSection.newPostalCode.alert.sub: Enter a postcode to view key data at a local level. This postcode will only be stored on your phone in the app.
onboarding.gesturesController.gesture8: Limit your social contacts (no more than 6)

manageDataController.showInfoNotificatio: Receive notifications for news and new data.
onboarding.runWithoutBleController.title: Phone not compatible
onboarding.runWithoutBleController.mainM: TousAntiCovid will not be able to detect your "Bluetooth contacts"
Unfortunately, your phone is not fully compatible with Bluetooth Low Energy, which is used to detect your "Bluetooth contacts". However, you can still access the other functions of the app.
If you have not received a QR code, contact a healthcare professional (doctor, nurse, pharmacist, dental surgeon, massage therapist, physiotherapist or midwife), who will be able to give you a 6-character code that will be valid for 1 hour and which can be entered via the TousAntiCovid Pro interface.

attestationsController.title: Forms
The manager of the "TousAntiCovid" app will not use any of the information entered into the form generator.

You may delete all of this information at any time by going to the app and selecting "Settings".
newAttestationController.title: New form
newAttestationController.footer: You can save this information on your phone for your next form. Your personal data will only be stored on the phone used to generate the form, in accordance with the general measures introduced to tackle the COVID-19 pandemic in the context of the state of health emergency. You can delete this data at any time by going to the app and selecting "Settings".
manageDataController.attestationsData.su: This will delete all the data on your phone relating to your forms, including any saved forms and data.
manageDataController.attestationsData.co: Are you sure you want to delete all of the data related to your forms? This cannot be undone.
attestationsController.menu.delete.alert: Are you sure you want to delete this form?
I certify that my journey is related to the following reason authorised by decree n¬∞2020-1310 from 29th October 2020 outlining the general measures introduced to tackle the Covid-19 epidemic in the context of the state of health emergency.
newAttestationController.missingInfo.ale: All fields must be completed in order to generate a form.
attestationController.footer: You can also generate a PDF version of the form on the Ministry of the Interior website:

attestationsController.expiredSection.su: These forms will be deleted automatically (within 24 hours, next time you open the app). You can delete all of this information at any time by going to the app and selecting "Settings".

keyFiguresController.explanation.alert.m:
Indicators are to be interpreted with caution, factoring in testing, the health context and population characteristics (age, population density, risk factors, etc.), as well as the quality of the data and the frequency at which it is collected, analysed as a whole. For more information on the monitoring of the health situation, please consult the weekly epidemiological report on the Public Health France website www.santepubliquefrance.fr
The R number is calculated over a period of 7 days ranging from D-9 to D-3. Data will be collected on Tuesdays and will be published once a week (on Thursdays). An R number is given for both the country as a whole (mainland France) and individual regions (both mainland and overseas regions). All other indicators are updated daily, after being confirmed by Public Health France and the Ministry of Social Affairs and Health. At a national level, data on the incidence rate and the positivity rate will be collected on D-3 and calculated as an average of the last 7 days [D-9; D-3] in order to take any fluctuation into account. Data on new cases will be collected on D-1, meaning this indicator will lack the perspective and context needed to confirm that it is an accurate reflection of the health situation.

Thank you for identifying yourself via the TousAntiCovid app and for informing those users you were in close contact with while you were contagious.

Thanks to you, these users will be able to take the necessary precautions in order to protect themselves and others. Let's keep up the fight against Covid.

home.activation.sick.alert.title: Information
home.activation.sick.alert.message:
The alert for exposure to COVID-19 cannot be activated for 2 months after you declare yourself positive for COVID-19.

For 2 months after testing positive for COVID-19, you will not be considered as being "at-risk of infection".

venuesRecording.onboardingController.mai: We need to work together to be informed and to inform others of exposure to COVID-19 in a certain location

Simply scan the QR codes on display in each location and you will find out if there is someone who has identified themselves as having COVID-19 in the application.

If you identify yourself as positive in the application, this will anonymously inform everyone else who was in this same location at the same time as you.

isolation.recommendation.symptoms.body:
Self-isolate immediately and seek out the nearest testing centre.

You should also self-isolate while you await the results of your test.
You can stop self-isolating!

Please continue to follow social distancing guidelines

Expected end of self-isolation: %@
